pkgmetadata.longdescription: LTOize is a set of configuration files and overrides to make building your system Link Time Optimization easy. This is part of a bigger initiative to find errors in C and C++ programs that are caused by undefined behaviour. Users are strongly encouraged to contribute their configuration changes upstream. For more information, see the gentooLTO project on GitHub.

use.flag: Install clang.conf overrides where LTO on Clang creates issues
Override strip-flags and replace-flags in flag-o-matic.eclass (EXPERIMENTAL)
Keep old -fno-common overrides for older GCCs (not recommended)
